front.title: An Extensible Markup Language (XML) Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) Usage for Conference Policy Manipulation

abstract.t: This document describes conference policy data elements and the mechanisms to manipulate them at a server via Conference Policy Control Protocol (CPCP). Extensible Markup Language (XML) Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) is used to implement CPCP. This document specifies an XML Schema and XCAP application usage that are needed to implement CPCP.
